AppSyncRuntime.description: Describes a runtime used by an AWS AppSync pipeline resolver or AWS AppSync function. Specifies the name and version of the runtime to use. Note that if a runtime is specified, code must also be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed value is APPSYNC_JS.

type.description: The name of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed value is APPSYNC_JS.

properties.name: RuntimeVersion
properties.description: The version of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed version is 1.0.0.

type.description: The version of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed version is 1.0.0.

LambdaConflictHandlerConfig.description: The LambdaConflictHandlerConfig when configuring LAMBDA as the Conflict Handler.

properties.name: LambdaConflictHandlerArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function to use as the Conflict Handler.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function to use as the Conflict Handler.

SyncConfig.description: Describes a Sync configuration for a resolver. Specifies which Conflict Detection strategy and Resolution strategy to use when the resolver is invoked.

properties.name: ConflictDetection
properties.description: The Conflict Detection strategy to use.

type.description: The Conflict Detection strategy to use.

properties.name: ConflictHandler
properties.description: The Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict.

type.description: The Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict.

resource.description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

properties.name: ApiId
properties.description: The AWS AppSync GraphQL API that you want to attach using this function.

type.description: The AWS AppSync GraphQL API that you want to attach using this function.

properties.name: Code
properties.description: The resolver code that contains the request and response functions. When code is used, the runtime is required. The runtime value must be APPSYNC_JS.

type.description: The resolver code that contains the request and response functions. When code is used, the runtime is required. The runtime value must be APPSYNC_JS.

properties.name: CodeS3Location
properties.description: The Amazon S3 endpoint (where the code is located??).

type.description: The Amazon S3 endpoint (where the code is located??).

properties.name: DataSourceName
properties.description: The name of data source this function will attach.

type.description: The name of data source this function will attach.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The function description.

type.description: The function description.

properties.name: FunctionVersion
properties.description: The version of the request mapping template. Currently, only the 2018-05-29 version of the template is supported.

type.description: The version of the request mapping template. Currently, only the 2018-05-29 version of the template is supported.

properties.name: MaxBatchSize
properties.description: The maximum number of resolver request inputs that will be sent to a single AWS Lambda function in a BatchInvoke operation.

type.description: The maximum number of resolver request inputs that will be sent to a single AWS Lambda function in a BatchInvoke operation.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the function.

type.description: The name of the function.

properties.name: RequestMappingTemplate
properties.description: The Function request mapping template. Functions support only the 2018-05-29 version of the request mapping template.

type.description: The Function request mapping template. Functions support only the 2018-05-29 version of the request mapping template.

properties.name: RequestMappingTemplateS3Location
properties.description: Describes a Sync configuration for a resolver. Contains information on which Conflict Detection, as well as Resolution strategy, should be performed when the resolver is invoked.

type.description: Describes a Sync configuration for a resolver. Contains information on which Conflict Detection, as well as Resolution strategy, should be performed when the resolver is invoked.

properties.name: ResponseMappingTemplate
properties.description: The Function response mapping template.

type.description: The Function response mapping template.

properties.name: ResponseMappingTemplateS3Location
properties.description: The location of a response mapping template in an Amazon S3 bucket. Use this if you want to provision with a template file in Amazon S3 rather than embedding it in your CloudFormation template.

type.description: The location of a response mapping template in an Amazon S3 bucket. Use this if you want to provision with a template file in Amazon S3 rather than embedding it in your CloudFormation template.

properties.name: Runtime
properties.description: Describes a runtime used by an AWS AppSync pipeline resolver or AWS AppSync function. Specifies the name and version of the runtime to use. Note that if a runtime is specified, code must also be specified.

type.description: Describes a runtime used by an AWS AppSync pipeline resolver or AWS AppSync function. Specifies the name and version of the runtime to use. Note that if a runtime is specified, code must also be specified.

properties.name: SyncConfig
properties.description: Describes a Sync configuration for a resolver. Specifies which Conflict Detection strategy and Resolution strategy to use when the resolver is invoked.

type.description: Describes a Sync configuration for a resolver. Specifies which Conflict Detection strategy and Resolution strategy to use when the resolver is invoked.

attributes.description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

properties.name: FunctionArn
properties.description: The ARN for the function generated by the service

type.description: The ARN for the function generated by the service

properties.name: FunctionId
properties.description: The unique identifier for the function generated by the service

type.description: The unique identifier for the function generated by the service
